title: Is there a chance Riot?
body:
Hi, I'm a high school student currently in my junior year. I've have been trying to find expansions into fields that I have interest in. One truly large field is marketing  and development. I have been looking for a Internship of any sorts, then I thought about Riot. I know you are huge company with a lot on your plate everyday. I know that you take very few college interns from a huge pool that is very competitive. However I'm here to just ask if there is any way I could get into contact with an employee with the idea of a non-pay pure work experience internship at riot. I know I could show that I have the ability to benefit Riot games, and it would be greatly appreciated if I could be given the opportunity to try to sell my self as an Intern to an employee.

Thanks for your time,

Twichty

replies.body: NJYosub has the right idea ^_^! They list everything over there, and you'll have the ability to check back for anything new whenever you need to with that page.
